161137.さいほうとは 素材となる布を ぬいあわせて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
Sewing is the process of stitching various fabrics together to make a variety of items.
Cut pieces of fabric are stitched together, and your goal is to align them with the success lines.
The quality of the finished item depends on how precise you are with lining up with these success lines.
Executing commands costs Focus, so running out means you won't be able to use any. Choose your commands carefully!
The power of your sewing level changes with each turn, so pay attention to the icon at the top of the sewing screen.
Red means a strong sewing strength, green means normal, and blue means weak. This affects how substantial your stitching is.
Be sure to adjust your commands accordingly depending on what your current sewing strength level is.
Note that if the game is interrupted via communication error during sewing, your ticket will be lost. Please be careful.

161138.さいほうの遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\nカットされた布を ぬいあわせて\n成:
This will explain how to sew!
Stitch the cut pieces of fabric together, and try your best to align them against the dotted success lines.
When all squares match the success lines, use the "Finish" command to complete your item!
Each time you stitch, your sewing strength changes. Keep an eye on the top of the sewing screen to see your current power.
Red means strong, green means normal, and blue means weak. This affects how substantial your next stitch will be.
Adjust your commands accordingly and be mindful of your Focus to aim for a perfection!

161139.さいほう設備がある。\nさいほう部員であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:
There is a Sewing Facility, where you can make
items if you are a member of the Sewing
Department.

161143.強化週間品となっている\nアイテムを 作りましょう！:
Create an Item that is an Enhanced Weekly
Item!

161144.強化週間品となっている アイテムを\nできのよさ ★１以上で しあげましょう！:

as Weekly Enhancement Items with a quality of
1 or higher!

161145.強化週間品となっている アイテムを\nできのよさ ★２以上で しあげましょう！:

161146.強化週間品となっている アイテムを\nできのよさ ★３（大成功）で しあげましょ:
Refurbish an item that has been designated as
an Enhanced Weekly Item with a quality of 3
(perfection)!

161165.<color_yellow>\n学園内では 所属する部の設備を使って\n何度でも:
In the school, you can practice as many times as you want using your club's equipment. You can practice as many times as
you like on your club's equipment in the school. You can practice with the equipment of other clubs by changing the club you belong
to. Practice as much as you want and improve your skills.

When selecting a recipe that you do not have the required materials for, the materials in your storages will be used instead.
